thread.title: Oak Hill to host Simpson Cup in 2016
thread.title_full: Oak Hill to host Simpson Cup in 2016

title: Oak Hill to host Simpson Cup in 2016
text:
Oak Hill to host Simpson Cup in 2016 
Updated: Wednesday, September 30 2015, 05:47 PM EDT 
Pittsford, N.Y. - Oak Hill Country Club has landed another golf event. 
The Simpson Cup is smaller in scale than the PGA Championship the club will host in 2023, but the athletes are well worth seeing. 
The Simpson Cup is a Ryder Cup-style tournament between 13 injured veterans from the U.S. and 13 from the U.K. 
The Simpson Cup benefits the On Course Foundation and local veterans groups. 
One Rochester-area veteran will be guaranteed a spot on the U.S. team. 
Veterans groups from around Western New York will be invited to watch. Oak Hill to host Simpson Cup in 2016 Related Stories
